languages.text: "Номос изменились после того, как поговорили с тобой, {name}. Теперь мы можем концептуализировать свой прошлый опыт — опыт одиночества. И он нам больше не нравится".

traits.locale_text: "Номос изменились после того, как поговорили с тобой, {name}. Теперь мы можем концептуализировать свой прошлый опыт — опыт одиночества. И он нам больше не нравится".

languages.text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
languages.original_text: "Номос изменились после того, как поговорили с тобой, {name}. Теперь мы можем концептуализировать свой прошлый опыт — опыт одиночества. И он нам больше не нравится".

traits.locale_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
"Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
"Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
"Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
"Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."
"Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

languages.text: « Nous avons changé depuis la dernière fois où nous nous sommes parlé, {name}. Nous sommes désormais capables de conceptualiser notre expérience passée de solitude, et nous ne l'aimons plus. »
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons changé depuis la dernière fois où nous nous sommes parlé, {name}. Nous sommes désormais capables de conceptualiser notre expérience passée de solitude, et nous ne l'aimons plus. »

languages.text: “自从我们上次与你谈话以来，{name}，诺莫斯改变了很多。我们现在能够概念化我们之前的经历，能够理解孤独的含义。不过，我们不再享受孤独。”
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: “自从我们上次与你谈话以来，{name}，诺莫斯改变了很多。我们现在能够概念化我们之前的经历，能够理解孤独的含义。不过，我们不再享受孤独。”

languages.text: "Nomos haben sich verändert, seit wir das letzte Mal mit Euch gesprochen haben, {name}. Wir können nun unsere vorherige Erfahrung begrifflich erfassen, die Erfahrung der Einsamkeit. Und wir haben keine Freude mehr daran."
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos haben sich verändert, seit wir das letzte Mal mit Euch gesprochen haben, {name}. Wir können nun unsere vorherige Erfahrung begrifflich erfassen, die Erfahrung der Einsamkeit. Und wir haben keine Freude mehr daran."

languages.text: «Nomos han cambiado desde la última vez que hablamos contigo, {name}. Ahora podemos conceptualizar lo que vivimos con anterioridad, la soledad. Y ya no es de nuestro agrado».
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: «Nomos han cambiado desde la última vez que hablamos contigo, {name}. Ahora podemos conceptualizar lo que vivimos con anterioridad, la soledad. Y ya no es de nuestro agrado».

languages.text: 「ノモスは前回あなた、{name}と会話してからずいぶん変わった。今後は孤独という過去の経験を概念化することができる。そして、もはやそれを楽しむことはない」
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスは前回あなた、{name}と会話してからずいぶん変わった。今後は孤独という過去の経験を概念化することができる。そして、もはやそれを楽しむことはない」

languages.text: "Nomos, sizinle son konuştuğumuzdan beri değişti {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Artık önceki deneyimimiz olan yalnızlığı kavramsallaştırmaya haiziz. Artık yalnızlıktan zevk almıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Nomos have changed since we last spoke with you, {name}. We are now able to conceptualise our previous experience, that of solitude. And we no longer enjoy it."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos, sizinle son konuştuğumuzdan beri değişti {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Artık önceki deneyimimiz olan yalnızlığı kavramsallaştırmaya haiziz. Artık yalnızlıktan zevk almıyoruz."
